rdf:Description.dc:title: Better balance, better business : options for work-life issues 2004 options for work-life issues.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Human Resources and Employment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: The book is for employers and managers who are interested in learning more about how pressures at work and away from the worksite combine to affect the business operation, and what can be done to improve the situation.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Work and family
Industrial relations
